TextEng: I am looking for some stolen relics.
I seek the kobolds who raided Hilltop.
If you lie to me again, I will kill you.
I want the relics you stole.
So who wants to tell me the truth?
I only wanted to get close enough to kill the leader first!
Text: 우두머리부터 죽이려고 가까이 가고 싶었을 뿐이야!

TextEng: You had better answer all my questions, if you want to survive.
Text: 살고 싶으면, 내 질문에 전부 대답하는 게 좋을 거야.

TextEng: Don't worry, scaly friend. I won't hurt you.
Text: 걱정 마, 비늘 달린 친구. 해치지 않을게.

TextEng: My name is <FirstName>. I just want to talk to you.
Why are you so worried about gnolls?
What are gnolls?
<StartCheck>[Persuade - lie]</Start> Yes, there was a large group I had to sneak by, just to get in here.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 거짓말]</Start> 응, 여기 들어오려고 몰래 지나친 큰 무리가 있었어.

TextEng: I never saw any gnolls.
I don't want to talk anymore. Goodbye.
Text: 더 이상 얘기하고 싶지 않아. 안녕.

TextEng: You don't look like a very tough leader, Urko!
Text: 별로 강해 보이지 않는 우두머리야, 우르코!

TextEng: And I am sure you make a great leader, Urko.
How did you get to be the leader, Urko?
I am done talking to you.
Now you die!
Yes, I am leaving now. Goodbye.
I have some other questions for you.
Who sent you after Drogan?
Do you have some stolen relics?
Are you the kobolds who raided Hilltop?
Would you like to be the leader, Yazka?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Do you want me to help you fight to become the leader here, Yazka?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 여기서 우두머리가 되도록 싸우는 걸 도와줄까, 야즈카?

TextEng: Who is Deekin?
Tell me what magic you speak of.
What did Deekin steal?
I need the mummified hand.
Give me the hand or I will kill you now!
Text: 손을 내놔. 안 그러면 지금 죽여버린다!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade - Lie]</Start> The hand is worthless. It was just a trophy from Drogan's adventures.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 거짓말]</Start> 그 손은 가치가 없어. 드로건의 모험에서 얻은 전리품일 뿐이야. [지능 보통]

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Difficult Persuade]</Start> I can protect you from the gnolls, if you give me the hand.
Text: <StartCheck>[어려운 설득]</Start> 손을 주면, 놀로부터 보호해줄 수 있어.

TextEng: So you are the kobolds that attacked Hilltop?
What kind of poison did you use?
You mean Tymofarrar?
No, but I met him and he is really angry with you.
Text: 아니, 하지만 만났는데 너희한테 엄청 화나 있더라.

TextEng: No, but I killed him.
<StartCheck>[Persuade - lie]</Start> Yes, and he sent me to get the artifacts you stole.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득 - 거짓말]</Start> 응, 그리고 네가 훔친 유물을 가져오라고 날 보냈어.

TextEng: Who is your Master?
So *you* are the ones who stabbed Drogan!
Tell me about the items you stole.
Nothing happened when the tower broke?
Text: 탑이 부서졌을 때 아무 일도 없었어?

TextEng: What did that stupid kobold do to the tower?
Text: 그 멍청한 코볼트가 탑에 무슨 짓을 한 거야?

TextEng: He broke the tower?
Why did you steal the magic items?
Goodbye.
I have some questions for you.
Tell me about the kobold who left the crypt recently.
Text: 최근에 지하실을 떠난 코볼트에 대해 말해봐.
